extension.caption: Month & Year
extension.author: Lee Cher Yeong

extension.description: Similar to Date field but for selecting month and year only.

field.name: startYear
field.label: Start year
field.description: Enter the starting year or earliest year available for selection. If left empty, it will default to 70 years ago from the current year.

field.name: endYear
field.label: End year
field.description: Enter the latest year or available for selection. If left empty, the current year will be used.
